mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TopicEntity (topicId, Title, Summary, PicUrl,TopicType,Recommend,Status,StatusCode,AddTime,ModifyTime,Source) VALUES (#{topicId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{picUrl}, #{topicType}, #{recommend}, #{status}, #{statusCode}, #{addTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{source}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE topicId = #{topicId}
